title: Gene's Australian Heritage Art
about: For more than two decades, Iâ€™ve been capturing the diverse essence of Australia. My passion lies in celebrating our nationâ€™s rich heritage, from the rugged beauty of the outback and the characters of our folklore to the vibrant landscapes and cultural icons that define us. Each piece is a tribute to the authentic Australian spirit and the stories that shape our identity.
heroSubtext: Authentic artwork celebrating the landscapes, icons, and spirit of Australia.

holidayMode.message: G'day! I'm currently away on leave. The gallery is still here for you to browse, but I'm not taking new orders at the moment.
